id: scenario-value-scanner-adult-scenarios-educational-adult learning about care economy through practice and reflection
title: Adult learning about care economy through practice and reflection
description: Adult learning about care economy through practice and reflection
content:
Scenario: Adult learning about care economy through practice and reflection
    Given Sarah is learning care economy principles while teaching them
    And adult learning happens through experience and reflection
    When Sarah uses the Value Scanner over time
    Then she should deepen her own value literacy continuously
    And the educational_elohim should support her learning journey
    And she should gain insights from teaching children
    And her understanding should evolve through practice
    And adults should learn care economy alongside children
